Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.xquery

This package contains implementation classes for an expression parser and analyzer for xquery language.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AeAbstractXQueryExpressionParser An abstract implementation of an expression parser for XQuery.
AeAbstractXQueryParseResult A base implementation of a parse result for the xquery language.
AeBPWSXQueryExpressionAnalyzer A concrete implementation of the expression util interface for XQuery 1.0.
AeBPWSXQueryExpressionParser An implementation of an expression parser for the xquery language.
AeBPWSXQueryParseResult A concrete implementation of a xquery parse result for BPEL 1.1.
AeNoOpFunctionCall A no-op XQuery function call.
AeNoOpVariable An implementation of an Expression that is used only for parsing for validation/analysis.
AeWSBPELXQueryExpressionAnalyzer A WS-BPEL implementation of a XQuery expression analyser.
AeWSBPELXQueryExpressionParser A BPEL 2.0 version of an XQuery expression parser.
AeWSBPELXQueryParseResult A WS-BPEL version of a XQuery parse result.
AeXQueryNamespaceResolver An implementation of a Saxon NamespaceResolver.
AeXQueryStaticFunctionLibrary Implements a function library for use during XQuery syntax validation.
AeXQueryStaticQueryContext A simple class used during static XQuery expression syntax validation.
AeXQueryStaticVariableResolver An implementation of an XQuery variable resolver.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.ext.expr.def.xquery Description

This package contains implementation classes for an expression parser and analyzer for xquery language. The XQuery language implementation is provided by Saxon (http://saxon.sourceforge.net/).
